fields.name: Valorant
fields.description: VALORANT is a competitive tactical shooter from the first-person perspective. It takes place on a near-future Earth and features a cast of characters known as agents, each of which have their own unique set of abilities to create tactical opportunities in a 5v5 team environmenent.

fields.name: League of Legends
fields.description: In the game, two teams of five players battle in player versus player combat, each team occupying and defending their half of the map. Each of the ten players controls a character, known as a "champion", with unique abilities and differing styles of play. A team wins by pushing through to the enemy
